name: Yummy Future
headline: We build robotic workforces for the food & beverage industry.
description:
We amplify worker produtivity by10X. Restaurants and food retail businesses require high volume and consistency, yet many business owners struggle to achieve this. Employees also dislike working in repetitive and labor-intensive environments, where even a slight mistake can lead to customer complaints. This results in high turnover rates in the restaurant industry.

Our goal is to let robots and machines handle the boring, laborious tasks so that humans can focus on engaging with customers and collecting product feedback.

founders.name: Jack Cui, Founder
founders.description: Any questions for robotics? Happy to help.

generated_description:
### Yummy Future: Revolutionizing the Food & Beverage Industry with Robots

**Mission**: Yummy Future is on a noteworthy mission to transform the food and beverage industry by creating robotic workforces that can significantly amplify productivity—reportedly by **10X**. They believe that by offloading the boring and labor-intensive tasks to machines, human employees can focus on what truly matters: engaging with customers and collecting valuable feedback.

**Origins**: Founded in 2018 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S19, Yummy Future emerged to tackle a common pain point in the restaurant sector. Many business owners are excited about high volume and consistency but often find it difficult to achieve. The repetitive nature of restaurant work leads to high turnover rates, which in turn affects service quality. This is where Yummy Future steps in, envisioning a future where robots handle repetitive tasks, allowing humans to excel in customer interaction.

**Location and Team**: Based in Champaign, Illinois, Yummy Future operates with a small but dedicated team of 7 employees. Their agility as a startup is one of their strengths, enabling rapid innovation and response to market needs. They are backed by notable partners, including nan as their Group Partner.

**Technology Focus**: The company is deeply rooted in the nexus of several prominent tech industries, boasting tags related to **artificial intelligence, hard tech, hardware, robotics,** and **AI**. This positions them at the cutting edge of technological advancements, allowing them to impact the way food and beverage businesses operate.

**What They’re Doing**: At Yummy Future, the focus is straightforward: design and build robotic solutions that elevate productivity. Their website promotes their vision, offering insights into their innovations and showcasing the potential of robotic integration in everyday food service scenarios.

**Explore More**: If you're intrigued and want to see Yummy Future in action or understand more about their offerings, you can visit their website at [Yummy Future](https://yummy-future.com). They provide links to learn more about their technology, team, and even a video that gives a fuller picture of their mission and capabilities.

In short, Yummy Future is not just building robots—they're shaping the future of work in the food industry, fundamentally changing how we think about productivity and customer service.
